name: WFH Weekly Calendar
description:
I've designed this calendar to make it easy to organise your life, achieve your goals, and make the most out of your time.


This is not intended to be a strict calendar for listing activities and routines by the minute or meal. Instead, I use blocks to highlight and allocate time to things I want to get done at a certain time, ensuring I have an even balance of leisure, work, and activities.


Duplicate the calendar for different scenarios. You could also use this as a subject or study planner, or a journaling aid. If you find micromanaging your day works for you too, then go for it.


I just hope this helps you live your best life possible!
